scripts.dev: cross-env ENV=local babel-node makeEnv.js && nodemon --watch src --exec babel-node src/platform.js
scripts.dev-server: cross-env ENV=local nodemon --watch src/AppServer.js  --watch src/entities --exec babel-node src/server.js
scripts.starter-server: cross-env ENV=starter nodemon --watch src/AppServer.js  --watch src/entities --exec babel-node src/server.js
scripts.demo-server: cross-env ENV=demo nodemon --watch src/AppServer.js  --watch src/entities --exec babel-node src/server.js
scripts.dev-client: cross-env ENV=local babel-node makeEnv.js && react-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run starter-dbsync && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run build-app
scripts.build-linux: npm run starter-dbsync && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && npm run build-app-linux
